h2_title: Where to Find the Macaque Chief
content: The first time you'll encounter this enemy is early in the Snowhill Path as you reach a plateau along the Snowclad Path after you spot the monkey awakening the Frozen Corpses.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Macaque_Chief.md', within the main section titled 'Macaque Chief', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Macaque Chief'.
The content is as follows:
The first time you'll encounter this enemy is early in the Snowhill Path as you reach a plateau along the Snowclad Path after you spot the monkey awakening the Frozen Corpses.
